::Aerotaur::
        His eyes brighten significantly, as if a great weight has been lifted from his shoulders.  "Please, Windlord, take me to her.  I need to see her, to speak with her again."  He looks at his friend pleadingly.


I dont really care if I'm not normal... so long as I'm abnormal within the normal range of abnormality.
